00012         class BlockedIp extends ActiveRecord implements Dateable
00013         {
00014                 protected function init($values)
00015                 {
00016                         if (!isset($this->blocked_at))
00017                         {
00018                                 $this->blocked_at = date("Y-m-d H:i:s");
00019                         }
00020                 }
00021 
00026                 public function rfc2822_date()
00027                 {
00028                         return date('r', strtotime($this->blocked_at));
00029                 }
00030 
00035                 public function iso8601_date()
00036                 {
00037                         return date('c', strtotime($this->blocked_at));
00038                 }
00039 
00044                 public function human_readable_date()
00045                 {
00046                         return strftime("%A %e %B %Y %H:%M:%S", strtotime($this->blocked_at));
00047                 }

00055                 public static function is_blocked($ip_addr)
00056                 {
00057                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00058 
00059                         $bip_factory = new self();
00060                         $ret = $bip_factory->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`ip_addr` = '{$conn->escape($ip_addr)}'"));
00061 
00062                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00063 
00064                         return count($ret) > 0;
00065                 }
00066         }
